alert.note: Alert for Sampson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 12:31PM EDT until July 14 at 1:15PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Sampson County in central North Carolina... * Until 115 PM EDT. * At 1230 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Harrells, or 13 miles south of Clinton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Harrells and Garland. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
